@ora@ isnt right, it must be @or1@ or @or2@
or2 is darker than or1.
And nice would be helpfull for people who need it.
[/quote]

Updated, thank you.[/quote]
Thanks to berky lol

item.title: Getting the "|" to work on your login screen
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Tested on: 317 Deob

Non or refactored: Non-Renamed

This was annoying to find, and half the servers here don’t have this correct.

The bug was, you couldn’t see this on the password, or couldn’t see it all.

Find something similiar to this below (if you can’t find it find username)

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Username: " + aString1173 + ((anInt1216 == 0) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@yel@|" : ""), j); j += 15; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 88, 0xffffff, "Password: " + Class50.method588(aString1174, 0) + ((anInt1216 == 1) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@yel@|" : ""), j);

Replace yours with that.

If you want to change the colors use these colors

@yel@ - Yellow @gre@ - Green @red@ - Red @whi@ - White @xxx@ - Cyan @or1@ - Orange, thanks Berky @or2@ - Orange2, thanks Berky

Read full topic
item.source: Getting the "|" to work on your login screen
